src_original: paramagurave namaḥ /  daśadiksarvaratnaṃ ca gurupādaṃ namāmi ca // 1 //
sadadhyāśayaḥ,  māyāśāṭhyarahitabodhiprasthānamahācittoḥ bodhisattvaśīlasya triśikṣāṃ suṣṭhu gṛhṇīyāt /
tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
evaṃ tena cittena bhojanamātrājñānam,  indriyadvārasaṃvaraṇam,  aṇumātre 'pyavadye bhayadarśanam,  aharniśaṃ yogañca āpādayet /
tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
kṛtāñjaliḥ daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet /
tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya,  svaparapāpān aśeṣān diśet /
aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet /
ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante, (tān)  āsaṃsāram aparinirvāṇāya prārthayeta /
yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet /
tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet /
yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt /
iti triḥ paṭhet /  tataḥ svakāyārpaṇaṃ,  tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge avasthānāya pratijānīyāt /
tataḥ svaśayyāyāṃ paryaṅkamābhujya gurubhaṭṭāraka-śrī-bodhibhadrakṛta-samādhi-(sambhāra)  parivarttoktāninavāṅgāni jñātvā śamathavipaśyanāyogaṃ bhāvayet /
yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,  'ekasatkalyāṇamitrata ekāviparyastamārgaśravaṇe kiṃ na syāt?
tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt /
tataḥ bhojanāvasare- 'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na puṣṭyartha,
tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam /  madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ /
ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
mokṣamārgīyakuśalamūlotpādakāmaādikārmikā ahorātraṃ vyarthamanavasthitāḥ,  tādṛgbhya āpattidoṣaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti /
śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ /
gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya // 4 //
